damn, i admit the author has more than ambition making this whole series but goddamnit do i need something wholesome after this. Hopefully if the author do continue this series there will be at least a tolerable ending... scratch that, there's no way this can be salvage unless it was all a dream i dont think there will be any "good" ending to exusiai in the foreseeable future.
So is this series ended ?? I hope not
I am also a fan of the artist's comics with Texas x Exusiai they are really nice.

I am just mostly mad at the Doctors in the story more than anything. I want to see how the story goes and see if Texas or somebody or everyone of her friends come to rescue her. I can tell that the author had an idea where this was going to go. I might have been mad at the artist or mainly the Doctors for what they are doing to Exusiai. Probably most likly the later since I get more into the story since I know it is and get more mad at the evil characters then the authors and the artists. I hope the artist is doing okay and would love how the story continues and to see if Exusiai's friends come to save her, mainly Texas.
People send death threats for the smallest things even, and if you sent that the wrong person, it will take a heavy toll on their mental health.. anyways, that's sad, play despacito..

See the thing here is, you can like something but it doesn't make you a bad person.. like me for example, i love this doujin and all the other shit kataokasan made, but it doesn't mean i didn't feel bad reading it.. it's normal to feel bad, cause it's basic human emotion.. in the other hand, you have people that despise these type of shit which is understansable.. but being so attached to a fictional character that you mixed up fiction and reality is just so wrong.. artists, authors, producers or whatever the fuck get harassed everyday, and they don't deserve it, no matter what they have drawn, be it these type of shit or loli hentai or a live action film.. I don't know where i was going with this.. i just wanted to say that kataokasan is gone, his pixiv and twitter was deleted.. he doesn't deserved getting harassed and attacked from what i heard.. really hoping he is safe..
This has the potential to turn wholesome, but author said fuck you.

Reading towards the end, I was just hoping for someone to come save her... Texas tracking her down or something, Emperor coming in guns blazing, or even doctor having a sudden change of heart. Just anyone... please help her.

Bro we just wanna jack off not cry

Also: Am I the only one who gets annoyed when doujins mention fourth wall stuff unless it's a comedy doujin? Like for example ''six star'' and ''I spent so many resources and you didn't come home'' and ''I spent resources leveling up your skills'' ? Kinda takes you out of the story imo

Honestly, he went too far. But I can't blame him, I'm actually glad that when he found out she was whoring herself he didnt continue down the path of a cuck like so many ntr doujins. He actually took action. Thing is the cucks from the beginning arent punished and are rewarded at the end. The one thing I wish he'd done is show Texas the recordings instead of making an enemy out of her and convince her that these people are responsible for her state and that the doctor is just caring for her. Then she'd get mad and go kill all of these ugly bastards, he stops torturing her, and things go back to normal. Thats what I would have done imo.

Still great though, made me nut over and over again
